name: To the past
description:
To the past

“To the past” is a game developed for the Brackeys Jam by Millhow (Game developer) & Landsykes (Designer). The theme “Rewind” gave us the idea to time travel to the past, in Prehistory time to be precise.
The player found a portal in his room, he will be sucked into it and will land in prehistoric times. Many monsters will appear, and the player need to defeat them with his slingshot, the only weapon he will have with him. But that’s not all, he can also gain a power of repulsion after defeating 15 enemies. This power allow the player to repulse all the monsters on the screen, and he can also move and attack during this time lapse.

You can set the game on the “Options” section, choose between Qwerty or Azerty keyboard, by default the game will be in Qwerty. You can also reduce or cut the sound if you want.

Game buttons is also easy, you can move left and right with A & D (or Q & D if you play with an Azerty keyboard), aim with mouse cursor, shoot with left mouse click and use your repulsion power with spacebar.

The spawn of enemies will be increase with the time, and the more longer you will play, the most difficult the game will become.


So, how many time can you survive to the past ?
